data.eml:eml: A new (singleton) rainfrog of the Pristimantis myersi Group (Amphibia: Craugastoridae) from the northern Andes of Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guayasamin, Juan M., Arteaga, Alejandro, Hutter, Carl R. (2018): A new (singleton) rainfrog of the Pristimantis myersi Group (Amphibia: Craugastoridae) from the northern Andes of Ecuador. Zootaxa 4527 (3): 323-334, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.3.2
